import React,{useState, useEffect }from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col ,Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' const SellerScreens = ({match}) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const fetchProduct= async() =>{ const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/sellers/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, [match]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

Price: ₹ {product.price}

Description: {product.description} Price: ₹ {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ? 'In Stock': 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default SellerScreens
